name: Youkai n' Roll
description:
Under the idyllic sky, two budding musicians have a fateful encounter...

Youkai n' Roll is a game made for Touhou Pride Game Jam 4. It is a rhythm game-visual novel hybrid featuring Kyouko and Mystia.

Credits

sqldatabunny - Programmer
Miles Yalzin - Composer
Icun P - Art
